text:
Hey, everyone,
welcome to "Roll It Back,"

the show where we
roll It back
to look at all the wild stuff

that went down
on "Just Roll With It."
Welcome to "Roll It Back."

This week we're breaking down
the "Just Roll With It" episode

"Birthday War"
in three, two, one.

We had some enormous
surprises in this episode.

And we're gonna break it
all down for you with...
Waka-waka-waka-what.

Suzi, I have a question
for you.

- Yeah.
- Do you like root beer?

- I used to.
- Check out the moment
  that changed Suzi's mind.
Let's roll it back.

I should point out that it is
filled with root beer,

so you're about to be part
of a root beer float.

- Oh!

Background!

Let's go!

- Yeah, that's crazy.

When they rolled that big
old tub of root beer out.

- It was insane.
- It was so big. Yeah.
It was so big.

Did you know, like,
how many gallons it held?

- 62 billion, I think.
- 500 gallons.

- ( laughter )
- I was worried it was gonna be

freezing cold,
but they actually warmed it up.

The crew added bubbles in
the tank and it got in my nose.
It was a huge mess.

All these Suzis are trapped
in root beer.

And it's up to us to save
as many Suzis as we can.

but you can--

you gotta bob for the Suzi,
and then you can use your hands

Suzis, count your Suzis.

- Boom. That's, like, 55.

So that means collectively
we saved somewhere between
80 and 1 million Suzis.

out when that barber showed up.

- Sorry, Tobie.
- Let's roll it back.

and I'm very proud to announce

- that the winner is a mohawk.

- ( laughter )
- Just rolling with it.

I'm just rolling with it.

Rolling.
And action, Suzi.
I hope they bring it hard.

You had a full head of hair
and just went to...

at first, I was like,

But then it's like, "No way.

that it was your own barber

I was totally caught
off guard.

I mean, the producers kept it

and they never gave me
a heads up.

They were all shocked,
especially me.

I'm so curious
what you'd look like

if the audience chose

Oh, well, you know what,
